panels.description: Database read rate. Note that these reads may be from caches and not from disk.
panels.title: Database Read Rate

panels.description: Measures how many of each database operation is performed each second across all chains
panels.title: Total Operations per Second

panels.description: Measures how long each database operation is taking on average
panels.title: Total Operations Latency

panels.description: Measures how many of each database operation is performed each second on X-Chain
panels.title: X-Chain Operations per Second

panels.description: Measures how long each database operation is taking on average on X-Chain
panels.title: X-Chain Operations Latency

panels.description: Measures how many of each database operation is performed each second on P-Chain
panels.title: P-Chain Operations per Second

panels.description: Measures how long each database operation is taking on average on P-Chain
panels.title: P-Chain Operations Latency

panels.description: Measures how many of each database operation is performed each second across all chains
panels.title: C-Chain Operations per Second

panels.description: Measures how long each database operation is taking on average on C-Chain
panels.title: C-Chain Operations Latency
